name: AKKA Technologies
bossPosition: Chairman of the Board and Group CEO
goal: AKKA Technologies is an engineering and technology consulting company with 21 centers of excellence across Europe, Africa, Middle-East, Asia and the Americas. As a European leader in the mobility segment with more than 21,000 skilled employees and an in-house research center, AKKA Research, it supports its clients with a wide-range of global services for industrial projects and the ability to collaborate across the entire product lifecycle.
